body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our company. My name is James Powell and I'm a customer service agent at XYZ Car Dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Janice. Could you please provide me with your current location for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm in City Center, at 123 Main Street.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. Can you also confirm your phone number so we can reach you if needed?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five, two three four, six seven eight nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Janice. We now have your location and phone number on file.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Is there anything specific you are looking for assistance with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm actually just browsing and feeling quite happy today, thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That's wonderful to hear, Janice. Thank you for your time and enjoy your browsing. Feel free to reach out if you have any questions. Have a great day!
